body_html:
@drpngx My first guess would be that IPython.start_ipython() doesn't
propagate the environment variables from the parent process

On Mon, Oct 24, 2016 at 3:28 PM, drpngx notifications@github.com wrote:

Nice!! Do you know why the difference? I wonder if that's something we
could work around on our end.

@ohadle https://github.com/ohadle does that work for you?

—

body:
@drpngx My first guess would be that `IPython.start_ipython()` doesn't
propagate the environment variables from the parent process

On Mon, Oct 24, 2016 at 3:28 PM, drpngx notifications@github.com wrote:

> Nice!! Do you know why the difference? I wonder if that's something we
> could work around on our end.
> 
> @ohadle https://github.com/ohadle does that work for you?
> 
> —
